availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas W. Page (Grant County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier (11th KY Cav))

body.p: Grant County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Eleanor Gravett Page in Grant County, Kentucky, in February 1853. Father of John T. Page. Married to Louisa Sallie Page in Grant County, Kentucky, in February 1858. Father of Charles W. Page, James R. Page, Mary A. Page, and Edwin M. Page. Farmer in Grant County, Kentucky, in 1860. Served in the 11th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a sergeant from September 22, 1862 to May 29, 1865.

ab.bibl:
